ABOUT

RFCO Development

[vc_column_text el_class=”nd_options_text_align_center_responsive”]RFCO is a leading Egyptian real estate corporate that develops distinctive, and valuable projects in different areas of Egypt since 2015. RFCO provides more than just properties, we aim to establish a strong and active residential community. As a subsidiary of RFCO, RAMY FARES Construction is the constructing arm for customer centric projects with a new low-cost business model. RFCO developed more than 18 projects in new Cairo and the new IL Mondo development in the new Cairo Capital. We are planning new developments in other areas in Egypt in the near future. In every project, we ensure worthy developments with livable designs, management, facility management, and a warm, vibrant community. Moreover, our first established as RAMY FARES construction, we developed more than 18 different projects in new Cairo.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInRight” width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1770″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1602208261682{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”6/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1467360650255{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;}”]

Hi! Our Company has been present for over 20 years in the market. We make the most of all our customers.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1467207292391{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

the designed structures encapsulate the luxuriousness through the material choice.
Show Projects
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”zoomIn” css=”.vc_custom_1602209647276{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column]

MEET THE TEAM

Rfco Development

[vc_column_text]

Our team is committed to offer a life-style community including complete services and facilities. Thought in all our projects, exerting maximum efforts to ensure the construction of high-quality communities and eco-friendly projects. We are focusing on quality and innovation; by taking full advantage of the capabilities of all our employees. Out team is working to built-up a reputation to become Egypt’s most valuable and innovative property developer by offering exceptional communities that aspiring homeowners, stakeholders, and investors.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1484665532676{margin-top: -110px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1484665538182{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
